title: Vietnam Tech StartupClub on Cardano
description: ベトナムの若いスタートアップコミュニティは、常にアイデアに溢れ、チャレンジ精神旺盛ですが、Catalyst Fundへのアクセス方法を知りません。

f6_assessments.q0:
There are only about 5 lines which talk about the particular project in the whole proposal: 

"To do that, we should gather together into a Startup Club on the Cardano platform.5.2. Deployment Plan (details are updated and added before October 7,2021) :
- Combined with the "Catalyst Course" proposal (https://cardano.ideascale.com/a/dtd/Catalyst-Course-in-Vietnamese/370032-48088) to find and call startups.
- Actively contact and share on forums, technology startup clubs...
5.3. Metrics to measure details are updated and added before October 7,2021)"

Proposal is clearly unfinished and should be published in next fund.
-Does not define how it will attract new proposers 
-Does not define how it will result in new proposal on Catalyst
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is unfinished and it is not understood what the project actually is or how it would be implemented.
f6_assessments.q2: Nothing to audit since project definition, KPIs and implementation description is missing.

f6_assessments.q0:
Has the problem needing to be solved been identified and articulated?
 Yes. Vietnamese Entrepreneurs cannot access Catalyst 

Does this proposal fall within the scope of the challenge brief?
Yes
 

Does this proposal show clearly how it will add value to the Cardano System?
Yes
 

Have key metrics and goals of the proposal been stated clearly 
No



Do the key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge
None mentioned

Can the proposal scale to address future challenges?
No way to know as budget and metrics are not listed.
f6_assessments.q1:
Has the proposer provided evidence (references, links, etc.) of relevant skills and experience needed to implement the proposal?
Yes team members or profiles are listed. The website is in Vietnamese and English  
 
Are these links sufficient?
Yes
 
Have you the CA visited these links and contacted the relevant people? 
Yes

Have you been able to assess their level of competence?
There is no way to asess this 

Does proposer know, in an identifiable manner, the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal?
Yes several team members are listed

Has he rationally and logically laid out his team structure and breakdown?
Yes

Has budget been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items?
No budget is given

IS budget reasonable to achieve the set goals?
Unknown 

Has the proposer provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required to implement the proposal?
No 

Have you verified this plan?
Nothing to verify 


Does proposal offer a realistic timetable to complete the work?
NO 


Does the proposal provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how?
No


Does the plan describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal?
No 
 


Does the proposal clearly explain  technical aspects like architecture, language and technologies if they are crucial for implementation?
No 

Has the proposer considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation?
No
f6_assessments.q2:
Is there clearly laid out a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement.
No

Are there clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal?
No


Is there a clear understandable description of the targeted problem?
Yes

 

Is there a clear understandable solution that addresses the problem?

Yes but no details are present, no budget, roadmap, KPIs, deliverables.
 

Has the proposer identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties?
No

 
How does the proposer plan to deal with these difficulties?
No plans given
 

Are there contingency plans in place for various outcomes?
No

There are no Budget or metrics/ KPIs  therefore I cannot recommend this proposal.  They have mentioned its coming by Oct 7th but I dont understand why they have not included it in the proposal. had those been there the proposal would have been complete.

f6_assessments.q0: yes, the startup club can increase the number of proposers, yet, this one is focused only on the Vietnamese community, thus, its efficiency comparing to other similar proposals is lower.
f6_assessments.q1: the team is having more proposals, I have checked their profiles, webpage, all seem to be in order, working, active. I am strongly convinced they can deliver.
f6_assessments.q2:
metrics are not provided, but I can come up with some:

1. number of active users
2. number of proposers within the group (some survey, etc)
3. possibly expanding the team, and therefore increasing the proposers
4. to audit the progress - stats of users 

The reason why I put a low score, is that it is not stated in the proposal. But I am strongly convinced that it can be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal clearly states the goal of building a Cardano VietNam club, in line with the current challenge and gathering more powerful resources for the development of practical applications on the cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: Documentation includes website, description of need, direction. However, it is necessary to add a detailed plan, timeline, roadmap
f6_assessments.q2: Additional information provided, progress and achievements to be achieved at each stage, indicators or levels to demonstrate achievement

solution: ブロックチェーンプラットフォーム「Cardano」上に「Vietnam Technology Startup Club」を設立。
experience: チーム：マーケティングスペシャリスト、コミュニティアウトリーチ、プロジェクトマネジメント、DevOps、テクニカルコンテンツライター＆アナリスト、英語＆ベトナム語堪能
